solution_line_template: He wants to stay {max_support_weight}*{safety_margin_percent}=<<{max_support_weight}*{safety_margin_percent}={safety_margin_amount}>>{safety_margin_amount} pounds under the max
So he wants to stay under {max_support_weight}-{safety_margin_amount}=<<{max_support_weight}-{safety_margin_amount}={safe_max_weight}>>{safe_max_weight} pounds
That means he can put {safe_max_weight}-{johns_weight}=<<{safe_max_weight}-{johns_weight}={weight_on_bar}>>{weight_on_bar} pounds on the bar
